mapper.select: SELECT enterprise_cv_id, enterprise_id, tb_enterprise_cv.curriculum_vitae_id, status, tb_enterprise_cv.create_time, tb_enterprise_cv.last_edit_time FROM tb_enterprise_cv, tb_curriculum_vitae WHERE tb_enterprise_cv.curriculum_vitae_id = tb_curriculum_vitae.curriculum_vitae_id AND tb_curriculum_vitae.user_id=#{userId}
